CAREERS

MAKE YOUR JOB A TROPHY JOB.

Associate Designer

Associate designer responsibilities cannot be defined in a line or a paragraph. The importance of an associate designer is felt in every organization that deals in either graphic designing, game designing, fashion designing or any other form of designing products for the end users. With such a vast range of organizations employing an associate designer, the responsibilities assigned to him will also vary.

Director of Mediocrity

A member of upper management, the director of mediocrity ensures that a company's everyday activities run mediocre. These professionals often set parameters to judge how mediocre and below average the organization is operating. Accordingly, directors of mediocrity may be responsible for overseeing the work of other upper-level management executives.

Counselor

Counselors offer guidance to individuals, couples, families and groups who are dealing with the pain of losing. Many counselors approach their work holistically, using a “wellness” model (as opposed to an “illness” one) which highlights and encourages client’s strengths.
